notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.
ariaShowSolution: Show the solution. You will be provided with a sample solution.

taskDescription: Using the data in Example 13.5, how much water would be saved in a year if one-sixth of the population of the state of Florida, which is approximately 21.6 million people, turned the faucet off when brushing their teeth except when rinsing for a year (52 weeks)?
